name: Dreamer-Online
description:
Dreamer-Online is 2D isometric MMORPG-sandbox with some special attendant mechanics like farming, crafting, building and card-based combat system, where each card is a real player with his own features.

Features

  • Recreating a miniature model of Earth with all its continents, islands, seas and oceans. The first continent - Eurasia is currently being developed;

  • 7 historical periods from the Stone Age, the Middle Ages till the present days and even to the future. It is currently available the character's development till the Middle Ages;

  • More than 50 craft recipes: tools, hand-craft items, weapons and cooking dishes;

  • 14 structures for building;

  • Creating and improvement samples of weapons and equipment (each about with 3-7 levels matching to stages of historical development);

  • The presence of RPG mechanics such as character’s progress and skill system for development in a certain direction (master technologies and exercise your character’s personal and combat capacities - you can be warrior, artisan, scientist, etc.); the perks system at the beginning of the character’s path, giving some certain advantages;

  • Card-based combat system, where each card is a real player with his own features. More than 100 people can be in the battle at the same time. The maximum number of people was not checked;

  • Day/night cycle and climate changes;

  • Survival (hunger and fatigue) and random events mechanics.

Gameplay

Every time as you come to a new game, you ask yourself (you certainly ask yourself): “What can I do here?” Everything is simple. What do you want from this game? And what can you afford yourself?

Imagine that you have only a knife and that minimum of knowledge in your head that will help you survive. And in addition, you found that you are in the Stone Age! That’s a mission! Or maybe it would be survival quest? It’s your call!

However, what will if we continue? Set up a village, plant a garden. This peaceful rural idyll can be broken only by fellow human being who has descended under the cover of night ... The outcome of its acquaintance will depend only on your professional ability to “knock for a loop” or “smoke a peace-pipe, getting from the loot”. So, don’t scratching head over here! Go to pieces your opponents in card battles, prove yourself as forward-looking strategian or smart tactician on the battlefield. And the character’s individual abilities will decide who’s the first say «Hello» in “making axe acquaintance”.

This is not the limit. Think ambitiously! Write a story beginning from ancient times. Start your adventures in one of the countries of Eurasia, gradually wander other continents and islands. Pump up your skills and do it better than others. Master technologies, explore the potential of nature and collect fossils from all over the world. Open various recipes and create what you want. And don’t be a loner man - recruit allies in your ranks!

So, whether you go with the bronze axe to conquer your first empire or go swimming towards the great geographical discoveries - it all depend only on you!

Indeed, in Dreamer-Online everybody gets the world that he or she wants to see.

Release Date: the game is in an early access since December 2019 (Google Play Store);

Languages: English, Russian;

Platforms: Android.
